queries.query: large fluid creature that lives in water and can drown enemies
queries.variant: large watery creature that can drown foes and lives in aquatic environments

queries.query: elemental monster with immunity to poison and ability to grapple multiple targets
queries.variant: elemental beast immune to poison and capable of grappling several enemies at once

queries.query: towering water creature that can reform and is difficult to injure
queries.variant: tall water elemental that can regenerate and is hard to damage

queries.query: creature with high mobility in water that attacks with bludgeoning damage
queries.variant: monster with great speed in water that deals bludgeoning damage when it attacks

queries.variant: monster that purifies water and is susceptible to cold damage
